com.commercetools.sunrise.common.controllers

Interface SimpleFormBindingControllerTrait<F,T,R>

  • Type Parameters:
    F - stereotype of the in a form wrapped class
    T - type of the context of the form, possibly a parameter object
    R - the type of the updated object if the form is valid
    All Superinterfaces:
    FormBindingTrait<F>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AddAddressController, AddProductToCartController, ChangeAddressController, ChangeLineItemQuantityController, CheckoutAddressController, CheckoutConfirmationController, CheckoutShippingController, LogInController, MyPersonalDetailsController, RemoveAddressController, RemoveLineItemController, SignUpController, SunriseAddAddressController, SunriseAddProductToCartController, SunriseChangeAddressController, SunriseChangeLineItemQuantityController, SunriseCheckoutAddressController, SunriseCheckoutConfirmationController, SunriseCheckoutShippingController, SunriseLogInController, SunriseMyPersonalDetailsController, SunriseRemoveAddressController, SunriseRemoveLineItemController, SunriseSignUpController

    public interface SimpleFormBindingControllerTrait<F,T,R>
extends FormBindingTrait<F>
    Approach to handle form data (Template Method Pattern).
